Text: Re Michael Milken Cc As I mentioned at our last meeting we have invited Michael Milken to speak at the Key Executive breakfast that the chapter is having in November Ive attached a copy of the invitation letter Upon checking in with Michaels assistant I said that you offered to phone Michael personally to get him to attend and I also mentioned Kens name I just received a call from Jeffrey Moore who handles the scheduling of all of Michaels speeches He said Michael gets requests a week and usually accepts one of them at most Many requests are from YPO chapters The reason he was calling me was to say under normal circumstances Michael wouldnt consider coming to Houston even for a YPO event but what gave him pause was you After I gave him all of the reasons why Michael should come he said it would still not be enough to justify the trip However he said if Jeff Skilling were to introduce Michael to the group that would greatly increase the probability that Michael would accept I told him that you would be happy to introduce him and reiterated your offer to call He said that was not necessary and that he would talk with Michael this weekend and get back to me next week There is nothing further that needs to be done at this point but I just wanted to keep you up to date in case you received a phone call from Jeffrey or Michael Thanks for the help and Ill keep you updated on our progress Mark Michael Milken doc Michael Milken doc
Cc Thanks again for taking the time to meet with Alfredo and I yesterday We felt the meeting was very useful and informative Talk with you soon Mark
